title: Chou Seimeitai Transformers Beast Wars Neo (Beast Wars Neo)
synopsis: Beast Wars Neo was a television series that aired in Japan in 1999, in support of the toyline of the same name. It directly follows Beast Wars II.
staff: [['Tanaka, Kazuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Hayashi, Yuzo', ['Music']], ['Sekita, Osamu', ['Series Production Director']], ['Takegami, Junki', ['Series Composition']]]
